seo_keywords: Eufy RoboVac side brush spinning but not cleaning

problems.title: 4 Beeps + Red Light (Brush Stuck)
problems.description: The robot stops and beeps 4 times.
possible_causes: Rolling brush is stuck with hair
solution_steps: Take out the brush and cut away hair using the cleaning tool.
Clean the yellow bearings at the ends of the brush.

problems.title: Short Runtime / Dies Quickly
problems.description: The robot only runs for 15-20 minutes before returning to dock.
solution_steps: Wipe charging contacts on base and robot.
If the robot is over a year old, the Li-ion battery needs replacement.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the issue on a RoboVac 11S / 11S MAX?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement part typically costs significantly less than a new $484 vacuum, and extending the life of your Eufy is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my RoboVac 11S / 11S MAX needs a new part?
faqs.answer: Common signs include strange noises and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the part on my RoboVac 11S / 11S MAX myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
